articles.title: Ackermann claims 'huge' wicket of Babar
articles.description: Pakistan batter Babar Azam is dismissed for five by Netherlands' Colin Ackermann in the 2023 Cricket World Cup in Hyderabad.
articles.content:
Netherlands' Colin Ackermann claims the "huge" wicket of Babar Azam for five to leave Pakistan on 34-2 in their Cricket World Cup group match in Hyderabad.
FOLLOW LIVE: Pakistan v Netherlands

articles.title: 'I've got no confidence' - Can Broad play baseball?

articles.content:

articles.title: ‘Where’s the crowd?’: Fans deride empty stadium at Cricket World Cup opener

articles.content:
